top.title: Minute's silence held to remember Bondi Beach attack victims
top.summary: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese was booed as he arrived at the memorial event.

top.title: Rights groups condemn new record number of executions in Saudi Arabia
top.summary: At least 347 people have now been put to death this year, according to the UK-based campaign group Reprieve.

top.title: Israel approves 19 new settlements in occupied West Bank
top.summary: Far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said the move was about blocking the establishment of a Palestinian state.

top.title: Will the US TikTok deal make it safer but less relevant?
top.summary: The key to the app's success - its algorithm - is to be retrained on US data. Will that make US TikTok blander?

top.title: TikTok owner signs deal to avoid US ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.
